BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISCMM_MET_FILE_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, NUM_COMM_ID, DT_OF_MEETING, STR_CITY_OR_PLACE, STR_VENUE,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,STR_MEETING_STATUS,STR_MEETING_BILL_STATUS) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MET_MEM_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_MEMBER_INFO, STR_MEMBERS_INFO_BY, STR_LETTER_NUMBER,DT_ON_DATE,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MET_AGE_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO, STR_AGENDA_F_NAME,DT_DATE_RECEIVED,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PISCMM_MET_MEM_TRN A WHERE A.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PISCMM_MET_AGE_TRN A WHERE A.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISCMM_MET_FILE_TRN T SET T.NUM_COMM_ID=?, T.DT_OF_MEETING=?, T.STR_CITY_OR_PLACE=?, T.STR_VENUE=?, T.STR_SELECT_PURPOSE=?, T.STR_REASON=?,T.DT_NEXT_MEETING=?,T.STR_MEETING_STATUS=?, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MET_MEM_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_MEMBER_INFO, STR_MEMBERS_INFO_BY, STR_LETTER_NUMBER,DT_ON_DATE,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MET_AGE_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MEETING_ID, STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO, STR_AGENDA_F_NAME,DT_DATE_RECEIVED,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PISCMM_MET_MEM_TRN A WHERE A.STR_MEETING_ID=?
DELETE FROM PISCMM_MET_AGE_TRN A WHERE A.STR_MEETING_ID=?
UPDATE PISCMM_MET_FILE_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCMM_MET_MEM_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCMM_MET_AGE_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
